description: Different states are easing lockdown at different rates, and some fear infections could rise again.
title: Coronavirus: Germany divided as states lift lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Germany divided as states lift lockdown - BBC News
maintext: But many suspect there's another reason for that so-called beauty contest. Angela Merkel is due to stand down next year after four terms in office. The race to succeed her was well under way but the coronavirus crisis has transformed political and public life and, with it, the chances of those with ambitions to the Chancellery.
